games.scenario: A man walks into a bar and asks the bartender for a glass of water. The bartender pulls out a gun and points it at the man. The man says, "Thank you" and walks out.
games.truth: The man had hiccups and the gun scared them out of him, to which he said, "Thank you."

games.scenario: A man brushes his teeth, turns out the light, and goes to bed. The next morning he wakes up, looks out the window, and kills himself.
games.truth: The man is a lighthouse keeper. He accidentally turned off the lighthouse beacon. In the morning he sees a shipwreck that he realizes he has caused.
